content.rendered:
Full Stack Developer

Full Stack Developer

Many people are interested in learning full stack development, but don’t know where to start. In this course, you will learn the fundamentals of both front-end and back-end web development by building real projects that you can add to your portfolio. We’ll start with a crash course in HTML, CSS and Bootstrap, then move on to diving into JavaScript. These lessons will be written in ES6 (also known as ES2015). By the end of this course you’ll have built a Full Stack project

A Full Stack Developer is a hybrid of front-end and back-end developer with in-depth knowledge of various web technologies like JavaScript, Redis, HTML5, CSS3, ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB & NPM. In this course you will learn full stack development from scratch to build real world applications and deploy it on Cloud environment.

First You need to focus on basics which includes Guides for Beginners in every language like Data Structures & Algorithms

Now a days knowing frontend development skills is regarded as a must know and every developer is expected to know these basic skills such as HTML, CSS, Javascript that being said, A full stack developer is expected to know to work in any environment and you get to work across multiple technologies Frontend, Backend, Database which are all skills in demand and knowing all these gives you an edge over other developers.

Also a full stack developer is more adaptable to change than any other developer and is always ready to evolve as this job requires learning new things also it is one of the most sought after job profiles with a high paying salary and a bright future cause employers have started appreciating people with a broader scope of knowledge

Also full stack developers are more likely to be selected to lead any development team as they are know themselves to handle all of the development work related to about both frontend and backend technologies.

Also learning full stack development makes you open to various opportunities

We offer a through and well revised course in full stack development

You can learn from the basic and master your skills to advance level

We offer you Object-oriented programming along with Data structures and Algorithms and DBMS which are the key concepts to learn as a backend developer. Along with that courses in HTML, CSS, Javascript and Bootstarp to start your frontend journey from scratch and after that advance frontend technologies such as React and Redux.

You will learn hands on development by learning through various live projects that we provide these projects will focus on all of the best practices for developing different programs and will also focus on developing projects that have real world applications

You will learn all of this from the best industry experts who will also share their insight and experiences and will prepare you for all of the challenges faced by a full stack developer in real world development 

You will also be prepared for interview through our various mock interviews

All of this to turn you into one formidable full stack developer

Explore Syllabus
